TestCase.name: testNotNeedTransposeProject_Anti1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 WHERE a NOT IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2)

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[OR(IS NULL($0), IS NULL($3), =($0, $3))], joinType=[anti]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

TestCase.name: testNotNeedTransposeProject_Anti2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b + 1, c FROM MyTable1 WHERE a NOT IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2)

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[+($1, 1)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[OR(IS NULL($0), IS NULL($3), =($0, $3))], joinType=[anti]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

TestCase.name: testNotNeedTransposeProject_Anti3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM MyTable1 WHERE a NOT IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2 WHERE b = e)

LogicalProject(select=[c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[NOT(IN($0, { LogicalProject(select=[d]) LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.b, $1)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]]) }))], variablesSet=[[$cor0]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]])

LogicalProject(select=[c]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(OR(IS NULL($0), IS NULL($3), =($0, $3)), =($1, $4))], joinType=[anti]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d, e]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[true]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

TestCase.name: testNotNeedTransposeProject_Semi1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 WHERE a IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2)

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

TestCase.name: testNotNeedTransposeProject_Semi2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b + 1, c FROM MyTable1 WHERE a IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2)

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[+($1, 1)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

TestCase.name: testNotNeedTransposeProject_Semi3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM MyTable1 WHERE a IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2 WHERE b = e)

LogicalProject(select=[c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[IN($0, { LogicalProject(select=[d]) LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.b, $1)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]]) })], variablesSet=[[$cor0]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]])

LogicalProject(select=[c]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), =($1, $4))], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d, e]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[true]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

TestCase.name: testTransposeProject_Anti1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a FROM MyTable1 WHERE a NOT IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2)

LogicalJoin(condition=[OR(IS NULL($0), IS NULL($1), =($0, $1))], joinType=[anti]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

TestCase.name: testTransposeProject_Anti2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a + 1 FROM MyTable1 WHERE a NOT IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2)

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[+($0, 1)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[OR(IS NULL($0), IS NULL($1), =($0, $1))], joinType=[anti]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

TestCase.name: testTransposeProject_Anti3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b FROM MyTable1 WHERE a NOT IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2)

LogicalJoin(condition=[OR(IS NULL($0), IS NULL($2), =($0, $2))], joinType=[anti]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, b]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

TestCase.name: testTransposeProject_Anti4
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, a FROM MyTable1 WHERE a NOT IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2)

LogicalProject(select=[b, a]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[OR(IS NULL($0), IS NULL($2), =($0, $2))], joinType=[anti]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, b]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

TestCase.name: testTransposeProject_Anti5
TestCase.Resource: SELECT d FROM (SELECT a, b, c, d FROM MyTable1, MyTable2) t WHERE a NOT IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2)

LogicalProject(select=[d]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[NOT(IN($0, { LogicalProject(select=[d]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]]) }))]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

LogicalProject(select=[d]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[OR(IS NULL($0), IS NULL($2), =($0, $2))], joinType=[anti]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, d]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d]) : +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

TestCase.name: testTransposeProject_EmptyProject
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM MyTable2, LATERAL TABLE(table_func(f)) AS T(f1) WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM MyTable3))

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[$3], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[IS NOT NULL($0)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], m=[MIN($0)]) +- LogicalProject(i=[true]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[$1], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalProject(select=[d]) : +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{2}]) : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]]) : +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[table_func($cor0.f)], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) EXPR$0)]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[IS NOT NULL($0)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], m=[MIN($0)]) +- LogicalProject(i=[true]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3]])

TestCase.name: testTransposeProject_Semi1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a FROM MyTable1 WHERE a IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2)

LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $1)], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[+($0, 1)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $1)], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

TestCase.name: testTransposeProject_Semi4
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, a FROM MyTable1 WHERE a IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2)

LogicalProject(select=[b, a]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, b]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

TestCase.name: testTransposeProject_Semi5
TestCase.Resource: SELECT d FROM (SELECT a, b, c, d FROM MyTable1, MyTable2) t WHERE a IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2)

LogicalProject(select=[d]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[IN($0, { LogicalProject(select=[d]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]]) })]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

LogicalProject(select=[d]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, d]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d]) : +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])
